positive_examples: This is an example of random walk model.
The random walk model demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed random walk model in this context.
A typical case of random walk model would involve these features.
The concept of random walk model applies here.
A mathematical model describing a path consisting of a succession of random steps, used in physics, economics, and biology.
negative_examples: This is an example of mathematical pendulum, not random walk model.
This represents mathematical model in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MathematicalPendulum, or other types of MathematicalModel

definition: A mathematical model where future position depends on random steps from current position.
